EmailTemplate.name: 201808_Global_Email_JetWave_WebCast_TM.201809_Global_Reminder-HourBefore_JetWave
EmailTemplate.subject: [REMINDER] Webcast - Experience the High-Speed Wi-Fi Advantage: Jet ConneX Powered by JetWave™
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> WEBCAST REMINDER Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Our webcast, Experience the High-Speed Wi-Fi Advantage: Jet ConneX Powered by JetWave™ will start in one hour!
Please click the link below to join the webcast. https://honeywell.zoom.us/j/665234464 <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/j/665234464]]>
In case Zoom has not been pushed to your PC, please download <[[https://zoom.us/download]]>.
See you soon!
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
